commands.name: Logger
commands.command: docker logs --tail 1000 country-monitor && docker attach --detach-keys='ctrl-c' country-monitor

commands.name: Logger Celery
commands.command: docker logs --tail 1000 celery-country-monitor && docker attach --detach-keys='ctrl-c' celery-country-monitor

commands.name: Restart
commands.command: docker compose down country-monitor && docker compose up -d country-monitor && docker logs --tail 1000 country-monitor && docker attach --detach-keys='ctrl-c' country-monitor

commands.name: Restart Celery
commands.command: docker compose down celery-country-monitor && docker compose up -d celery-country-monitor && docker logs --tail 1000 celery-country-monitor && docker attach --detach-keys='ctrl-c' celery-country-monitor

commands.name: Shell Docker
commands.command: docker logs --tail 1000 country-monitor && docker exec -it country-monitor sh
